<hr data-start="100" data-end="103">
<h2 data-start="105" data-end="152">✅ Step 1: Understand Screener.in’s Structure</h2>
<h3 data-start="154" data-end="166">🎯 Goal:</h3>
<p data-start="167" data-end="268">Understand how to get stock data from <a data-start="205" data-end="244" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="" href="https://www.screener.in/">Screener.in</a> using an <strong data-start="254" data-end="267">ISIN code</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="270" data-end="273">
<h3 data-start="275" data-end="298">🔍 What is an ISIN?</h3>
<p data-start="300" data-end="428">ISIN stands for <strong data-start="316" data-end="366">International Securities Identification Number</strong> — it’s a unique 12-character code for securities like stocks.</p>
<p data-start="430" data-end="571"><strong data-start="430" data-end="442">Example:</strong><br data-start="442" data-end="445">
RELIANCE Industries ISIN = <code data-start="472" data-end="486">INE002A01018</code><br data-start="486" data-end="489">
But Screener.in uses the <strong data-start="514" data-end="530">company name</strong> (like <code data-start="537" data-end="547">RELIANCE</code>) in its URL — not ISIN.</p>
<hr data-start="573" data-end="576">
<h3 data-start="578" data-end="619">🎯 Task 1.1 – Open Screener &amp; Explore</h3>
<ol data-start="621" data-end="881">
<li data-start="621" data-end="681">
<p data-start="624" data-end="681">Visit: <a data-start="631" data-end="681" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="" href="https://www.screener.in/">https://www.screener.in</a></p>
</li>
<li data-start="682" data-end="773">
<p data-start="685" data-end="773">Use the search bar at the top and type:<br data-start="724" data-end="727">
<code data-start="730" data-end="744">INE002A01018</code> or any ISIN you find online.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="774" data-end="881">
<p data-start="777" data-end="785">Observe:</p>
<ul data-start="789" data-end="881">
<li data-start="789" data-end="814">
<p data-start="791" data-end="814">Does it show a company?</p>
</li>

<hr data-start="186" data-end="189">
<h2 data-start="191" data-end="242">Step-by-Step: Using OpenFIGI API to Convert ISIN</h2>
<h3 data-start="244" data-end="269">1. About OpenFIGI API</h3>
<ul data-start="271" data-end="427">
<li data-start="271" data-end="357">
<p data-start="273" data-end="357">OpenFIGI provides a way to search financial instruments using identifiers like ISIN.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="358" data-end="427">
<p data-start="360" data-end="427">Their API returns metadata including the company's ticker and name.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="429" data-end="446">2. How to Use</h3>
<ul data-start="448" data-end="598">
<li data-start="448" data-end="551">
<p data-start="450" data-end="551">You send a POST request to <code data-start="477" data-end="514">https://api.openfigi.com/v3/mapping</code> with JSON data containing your ISIN.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="552" data-end="598">
<p data-start="554" data-end="598">The response contains ticker and other info.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="600" data-end="603">
<h3 data-start="605" data-end="630">3. Getting an API Key</h3>
<ul data-start="632" data-end="734">
<li data-start="632" data-end="695">
<p data-start="634" data-end="695">Sign up for a free API key here: <a data-start="667" data-end="695" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="cursor-pointer">https://www.openfigi.com/api</a></p>
</li>
<li data-start="696" data-end="734">
<p data-start="698" data-end="734">You’ll receive an API key via email.</p>
</li>
</ul>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">isin_to_ticker</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):

        name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'data'</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> ticker, name
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Example usage</span></span><span>
api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'</span></span><span>
isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE002A01018'</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Reliance Industries</span></span><span>

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics (this depends on the page structure, here is an example)</span></span><span>

    metrics = {}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Market Cap, P/E, ROE, etc. are in a table with class 'key-metrics'</span></span><span>
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Hardcoded ISIN to company name mapping</span></span><span>
isin_mapping = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE002A01018"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"RELIANCE"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE123A01016"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TCS"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE062A01020"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INFY"</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> isin_mapping.get(isin.upper(), </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>)
    company = get_company_from_isin(isin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFetching data for: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
        stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to get stock data."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in mapping!"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Overview</span></span><span>

This Python CLI app accepts an ISIN code, converts it to a company name using a hardcoded mapping, then scrapes stock key metrics and pros/cons from Screener.in.

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Features</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> ISIN to company name conversion (hardcoded)
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Web scraping of stock data from Screener.in
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Displays key metrics and pros/cons

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Setup Instructions</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">1.</span></span><span> Clone the repo  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">2.</span></span><span> (Optional) Create a virtual environment  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">3.</span></span><span> Install dependencies:  
<span class="hljs-code">```bash
pip install requests beautifulsoup4
</span></span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="4369" data-end="4383">Limitations</h2>
<ul data-start="4385" data-end="4581">
<li data-start="4385" data-end="4439">
<p data-start="4387" data-end="4439">ISIN mapping is hardcoded for only a few companies</p>

<li data-start="4440" data-end="4494">
<p data-start="4442" data-end="4494">No API integration yet for dynamic ISIN conversion</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4495" data-end="4581">

<hr data-start="196" data-end="199">
<h1 data-start="201" data-end="245">Part 2: Using OpenFIGI API to Convert ISIN</h1>
<hr data-start="247" data-end="250">

<hr data-start="367" data-end="370">
<h2 data-start="372" data-end="427">Step 2: Minimal Python function to call OpenFIGI API</h2>
<p data-start="429" data-end="486">Create a new file or add this to your existing <code data-start="476" data-end="485">main.py</code>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="488" data-end="1220"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">isin_to_company_openfigi</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'https://api.openfigi.com/v3/mapping'</span></span><span>
    headers = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Content-Type'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'application/json'</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'X-OPENFIGI-APIKEY'</span></span><span>: api_key
    }
    payload = [{
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"idType"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ID_ISIN"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"idValue"</span></span><span>: isin
    }]
    
    response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"OpenFIGI API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>):
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"name"</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ticker"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1222" data-end="1225">
<h2 data-start="1227" data-end="1272">Step 3: Integrate API method with your CLI</h2>
<p data-start="1274" data-end="1290">Add to <code data-start="1281" data-end="1289">main()</code>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1292" data-end="2574"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Use external API</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"YOUR_OPENFIGI_API_KEY"</span></span><span>
    result = isin_to_company_openfigi(isin, api_key)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> result:
        company_name, ticker = result
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nCompany name from API: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>, Ticker: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span><span>")
        
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># For Screener.in, use ticker or company_name in URL (clean name, uppercase)</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Example: https://www.screener.in/company/RELIANCE/</span></span><span>
        company_for_url = ticker </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> ticker </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> company_name
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_for_url:
            company_for_url = company_for_url.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).upper()
            stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company_for_url)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to get stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Could not derive company URL for scraping."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found via API."</span></span><span>)

<hr data-start="177" data-end="180">
<h1 data-start="182" data-end="236">Full <code data-start="189" data-end="198">main.py</code> with OpenFIGI API + Screener Scraping</h1>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="238" data-end="3405"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">isin_to_company_openfigi</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'https://api.openfigi.com/v3/mapping'</span></span><span>
    headers = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Content-Type'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'application/json'</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'X-OPENFIGI-APIKEY'</span></span><span>: api_key
    }
    payload = [{
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"idType"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ID_ISIN"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"idValue"</span></span><span>: isin
    }]
    
    response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"OpenFIGI API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>):
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"name"</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"data"</span></span><span>][</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ticker"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"YOUR_OPENFIGI_API_KEY"</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace this with your OpenFIGI API key</span></span><span>
    
    result = isin_to_company_openfigi(isin, api_key)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> result:
        company_name, ticker = result
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nCompany name from API: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>, Ticker: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span><span>")
        
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Prepare company name/ticker for screener URL</span></span><span>
        company_for_url = ticker </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> ticker </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> company_name
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_for_url:
            company_for_url = company_for_url.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).upper()
            stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company_for_url)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to get stock data from Screener.in."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Could not derive company URL for scraping."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found via OpenFIGI API."</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="343" data-end="375">Step 1: Adjust your <code data-start="366" data-end="375">isin.py</code></h2>
<p data-start="377" data-end="520">Since you can’t use the OpenFIGI API, use the hardcoded mapping version of the script — here’s a simplified version for you, <strong data-start="502" data-end="519">no API needed</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="522" data-end="2623"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

isin_mapping = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE002A01018"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"RELIANCE"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE123A01016"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TCS"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE062A01020"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INFY"</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> isin_mapping.get(isin.upper(), </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    company = get_company_from_isin(isin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFetching data for: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
        stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

<hr data-start="218" data-end="221">
<h3 data-start="223" data-end="251">🔍 Free ISIN Lookup APIs</h3>
<h4 data-start="253" data-end="303">1. <strong data-start="261" data-end="303">Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) ISIN API</strong></h4>
<ul data-start="305" data-end="629">
<li data-start="305" data-end="393">
<p data-start="307" data-end="393"><strong data-start="307" data-end="319">Endpoint</strong>: <code data-start="321" data-end="393">https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=US0378331005</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="394" data-end="498">
<p data-start="396" data-end="498"><strong data-start="396" data-end="408">Features</strong>: Retrieves company name, stock symbol, and market capitalization associated with an ISIN.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="499" data-end="629">
<p data-start="501" data-end="629"><strong data-start="501" data-end="516">Limitations</strong>: Requires an API key; however, they offer a free tier with limited access. </p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-start="631" data-end="682">2. <strong data-start="639" data-end="682">EOD Historical Data (EODHD) ISIN Search</strong></h4>
<ul data-start="684" data-end="971">
<li data-start="684" data-end="772">
<p data-start="686" data-end="772"><strong data-start="686" data-end="698">Endpoint</strong>: <code data-start="700" data-end="772">https://eodhistoricaldata.com/api/search/AAPL?api_token=YOUR_API_TOKEN</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="773" data-end="846">
<p data-start="775" data-end="846"><strong data-start="775" data-end="787">Features</strong>: Allows searching by ISIN and returns company information.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="847" data-end="971">
<p data-start="849" data-end="971"><strong data-start="849" data-end="864">Limitations</strong>: Requires an API key; they offer a free trial with limited requests. </p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-start="973" data-end="1002">3. <strong data-start="981" data-end="1002">Lemon Markets API</strong></h4>

<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1521" data-end="2373"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'YOUR_FMP_API_KEY'</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your FMP API key</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, api_key)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Company Name: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Ticker Symbol: <span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>")
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    company_name = get_company_from_isin_google(isin)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nCompany name found via Google: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to get stock data from Screener.in."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Could not find company name for the provided ISIN."</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<ul data-start="162" data-end="361">
<li data-start="162" data-end="240">
<p data-start="164" data-end="240">Google blocked the request due to no proper headers or suspicious behavior</p>

<li data-start="241" data-end="361">
<p data-start="243" data-end="361">Or Google requires more careful handling (like cookies, JavaScript, or CAPTCHA) which simple <code data-start="336" data-end="346">requests</code> can’t handle</p>

<hr data-start="363" data-end="366">
<h2 data-start="368" data-end="433">How to fix and improve Google search scraping for your script:</h2>
<h3 data-start="435" data-end="496">1. Use more realistic <strong data-start="461" data-end="472">headers</strong> to mimic a real browser</h3>
<p data-start="498" data-end="521">Update your headers to:</p>

<p data-start="1201" data-end="1283">The HTML returned by DuckDuckGo is simpler and easier to parse without JavaScript.</p>

<h2 data-start="1290" data-end="1367">Here is an improved version of your Google (or DuckDuckGo) search function</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1369" data-end="2645"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin_google</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># be polite</span></span><span>
    
    query = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span> stock"
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Try DuckDuckGo instead of Google</span></span><span>
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=<span class="hljs-subst">{urllib.parse.quote(query)}</span></span></span><span>"
    
    headers = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Accept-Language"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"en-US,en;q=0.9"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Accept"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Connection"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"keep-alive"</span></span><span>
    }
    
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Search failed, status code:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># DuckDuckGo result titles are in &lt;a class="result__a"&gt;</span></span><span>
    a_tag = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"a"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"result__a"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> a_tag:
        title = a_tag.get_text()
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sep </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> [</span><span><span class="hljs-string">' stock'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">' share price'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">' share prices'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">' share'</span></span><span>]:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> sep </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> title.lower():
                company_name = title.lower().split(sep)[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>]
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name.title()
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> title
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No results found"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="246" data-end="2919"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin_fmp</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Clean company name for Screener.in URL</span></span><span>
    company_for_url = company_name.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"."</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).upper()
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:

        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
