</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin_fmp</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    company_for_url = company_name.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"."</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).upper()
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4BVYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin_fmp(isin, api_key)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nCompany name from FMP API: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>, Ticker: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span><span>")
        stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin_fmp</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):

    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    company_for_url = company_name.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"."</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).upper()
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>/"
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_for_url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    key_metrics = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"clearfix"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> metric </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> key_metrics:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
            key = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"field-name"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            value = metric.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"span"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"number"</span></span><span>).text.strip()
            metrics[key] = value
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

    pros = []
    cons = []
    pros_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros-cons"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_section:
        pros_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_ul:
            pros = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pros_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]
        cons_ul = pros_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ul"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_ul:
            cons = [li.text.strip() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> li </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> cons_ul.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"li"</span></span><span>)]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin_fmp(isin, api_key)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nCompany name from FMP API: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>, Ticker: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span><span>")
        stock_data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
                </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to get stock data from Screener.in."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found via FMP API."</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<hr data-start="1937" data-end="1940">
<h2 data-start="1942" data-end="1979">5. Full improved scraping function</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1981" data-end="3410"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64)"</span></span><span>}

<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="165" data-end="2730"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Hardcoded ISIN to company mapping</span></span><span>
isin_mapping = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE002A01018"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"RELIANCE"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE123A01016"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TCS"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE062A01020"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INFY"</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> isin_mapping.get(isin.upper())

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64)"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons from #analysis section</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        paragraphs = analysis_section.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"p"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"sub"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(paragraphs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
            pros_text = paragraphs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            cons_text = paragraphs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_text:
                pros.append(pros_text)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_text:
                cons.append(cons_text)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> paragraphs:
            pros.append(paragraphs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found for pros and cons"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    company = get_company_from_isin(isin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in hardcoded mapping!"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFetching data for: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
    data = scrape_stock_data(company)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="352" data-end="418">1. Inspect Screener.in’s actual structure of pros and cons box:</h2>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Hardcoded ISIN to company mapping</span></span><span>
isin_mapping = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE002A01018"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"RELIANCE"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE123A01016"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TCS"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INE062A01020"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"INFY"</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> isin_mapping.get(isin.upper())

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64)"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons from the specific flex div inside analysis section</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No flex div with pros/cons found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip()
    company = get_company_from_isin(isin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in hardcoded mapping!"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFetching data for: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
    data = scrape_stock_data(company)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> string

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_morningstar_letter</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">letter</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.morningstar.in/equities/<span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>.aspx'

    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to load page for letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span> with status code </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> []
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    stocks = []
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># The stocks are typically inside a table with class 'tbl'</span></span><span>
    table = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'table'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tbl'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> table:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"No data table found on page <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

    rows = table.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tr'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> rows[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:]:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># skip header row</span></span><span>
        cols = row.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'td'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(cols) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            company_name = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            isin = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            stocks.append((isin, company_name))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    all_stocks = []
    letters = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(string.ascii_uppercase)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> letter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> letters:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraping letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>...")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        writer = csv.writer(f)
        writer.writerow([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>])
        writer.writerows(all_stocks)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraped total <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span></span></span><span>(all_stocks)} stocks and saved to morningstar_isin_mapping.csv")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:

<hr data-start="55" data-end="58">
<h3 data-start="60" data-end="103">How the scraper + lookup approach works</h3>
<ol data-start="105" data-end="791">
<li data-start="105" data-end="341">
<p data-start="108" data-end="341"><strong data-start="108" data-end="136">Scraping all pages once:</strong><br data-start="136" data-end="139">
You run the script I gave you (like <code data-start="178" data-end="202">morningstar_scraper.py</code>) <strong data-start="204" data-end="216">one time</strong>. This downloads all ISIN-company pairs from A-Z pages and saves them locally to a CSV file (<code data-start="309" data-end="339">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code>).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="343" data-end="638">
<p data-start="346" data-end="638"><strong data-start="346" data-end="382">Using the saved data for lookup:</strong><br data-start="382" data-end="385">
Your main program (the one where you input an ISIN) <strong data-start="440" data-end="470">loads that CSV into memory</strong> once at startup.<br data-start="487" data-end="490">
When you enter an ISIN, it quickly <strong data-start="528" data-end="560">searches the loaded CSV data</strong> (no need to scrape Morningstar every time) to find the matching company name.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="640" data-end="791">
<p data-start="643" data-end="791"><strong data-start="643" data-end="668">Scraping Screener.in:</strong><br data-start="668" data-end="671">
With the company name found from the CSV lookup, your program scrapes Screener.in for the stock info and displays it.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="793" data-end="796">
<h3 data-start="798" data-end="820">Why this is better</h3>
<ul data-start="822" data-end="1136">
<li data-start="822" data-end="945">
<p data-start="824" data-end="945">Scraping Morningstar A-Z pages every time someone enters an ISIN would be <strong data-start="898" data-end="921">very slow and heavy</strong> (many HTTP requests).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="946" data-end="1036">
<p data-start="948" data-end="1036">Downloading all ISIN-company mappings once and reusing them is <strong data-start="1011" data-end="1033">fast and efficient</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1037" data-end="1136">
<p data-start="1039" data-end="1136">You update your CSV file occasionally (e.g., once a week/month) by re-running the scraper script.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1138" data-end="1141">
<h3 data-start="1143" data-end="1167">What you need to do:</h3>
<ul data-start="1169" data-end="1401">
<li data-start="1169" data-end="1251">
<p data-start="1171" data-end="1251">Run the Morningstar scraper <strong data-start="1199" data-end="1207">once</strong> to create <code data-start="1218" data-end="1248">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1252" data-end="1344">
<p data-start="1254" data-end="1344">Modify your main ISIN program to <strong data-start="1287" data-end="1315">load this CSV on startup</strong> and look for ISIN matches.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1345" data-end="1401">
<p data-start="1347" data-end="1401">Then scrape Screener.in with the matched company name.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1403" data-end="1406">
<h3 data-start="1408" data-end="1468">Here’s a sample snippet to load and lookup from the CSV:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1470" data-end="1908"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Usage example:</span></span><span>
isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> isin_mapping.get(isin.upper())
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="312" data-end="363">Step 1: Scrape Morningstar and Save ISIN Mapping</h2>
<p data-start="365" data-end="403">Save this as <code data-start="378" data-end="402">morningstar_scraper.py</code>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="405" data-end="1933"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> string

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_morningstar_letter</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">letter</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.morningstar.in/equities/<span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>.aspx'
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to load page for letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span> with status </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> []
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    stocks = []
    table = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'table'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tbl'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> table:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"No table found on page <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

    rows = table.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tr'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> rows[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:]:
        cols = row.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'td'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(cols) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            company_name = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            isin = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            stocks.append((isin, company_name))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    all_stocks = []
    letters = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(string.ascii_uppercase)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> letter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> letters:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraping letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>...")
        stocks = scrape_morningstar_letter(letter)
        all_stocks.extend(stocks)
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># polite delay</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        writer = csv.writer(f)
        writer.writerow([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>])
        writer.writerows(all_stocks)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Saved <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span></span></span><span>(all_stocks)} stocks to morningstar_isin_mapping.csv")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company = isin_mapping.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in mapping."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
    data = scrape_stock_data(company)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<p data-start="274" data-end="307">Use this script (same as before):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="309" data-end="1837"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> string

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_morningstar_letter</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">letter</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.morningstar.in/equities/<span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>.aspx'
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to load page for letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span> with status </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> []
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    stocks = []
    table = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'table'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tbl'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> table:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"No table found on page <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

    rows = table.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tr'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> rows[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:]:
        cols = row.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'td'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(cols) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            company_name = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            isin = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            stocks.append((isin, company_name))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    all_stocks = []
    letters = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(string.ascii_uppercase)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> letter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> letters:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraping letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>...")
        stocks = scrape_morningstar_letter(letter)
        all_stocks.extend(stocks)
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># polite delay</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        writer = csv.writer(f)
        writer.writerow([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>])
        writer.writerows(all_stocks)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Saved <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span></span></span><span>(all_stocks)} stocks to morningstar_isin_mapping.csv")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
