<h1 data-start="2217" data-end="2269">Step 2: Create your ISIN lookup + Screener scraper</h1>
<p data-start="2271" data-end="2384">Save this script as <code data-start="2291" data-end="2308">isin_scraper.py</code> inside the <strong data-start="2320" data-end="2335">same folder</strong> (<code data-start="2337" data-end="2382">C:\Users\lucky\OneDrive\Desktop\morningstar</code>):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="2386" data-end="4994"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company = isin_mapping.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in mapping."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company}</span></span></span><span>")
    data = scrape_stock_data(company)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

Below is the <strong data-start="92" data-end="109">complete code</strong> that uses the FMP API to look up the company from an ISIN, then scrapes <strong data-start="182" data-end="197">Screener.in</strong> for the stock data based on the company name.</p>
<h3 data-start="245" data-end="308">Full Code to Look Up ISIN and Scrape Data from Screener.in:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="310" data-end="4084"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your actual FMP API key</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load ISIN mapping (this assumes you've already scraped and saved ISIN mappings in a CSV)</span></span><span>
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company_name = isin_mapping.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Use FMP API if ISIN is not found in the local mapping</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in mapping, trying FMP API..."</span></span><span>)
        company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, api_key)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Unable to retrieve company information from FMP API."</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<ol data-start="4116" data-end="4642">

</li>

<p data-start="5233" data-end="5244"><strong data-start="5233" data-end="5243">Run it</strong>:</p>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):

    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,

    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>

    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> string

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_morningstar_letter</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">letter</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.morningstar.in/equities/<span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>.aspx'
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to load page for letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span> with status </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> []
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    stocks = []
    table = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'table'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'snapshotTable'</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Update the class if needed</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> table:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"No table found on page <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

    rows = table.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tr'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> rows[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:]:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># skip header row</span></span><span>
        cols = row.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'td'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(cols) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            company_name = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            isin = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            stocks.append((isin, company_name))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    all_stocks = []
    letters = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(string.ascii_uppercase)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># A-Z</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> letter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> letters:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraping letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>...")
        stocks = scrape_morningstar_letter(letter)
        all_stocks.extend(stocks)
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># polite delay</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Save to CSV</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        writer = csv.writer(f)
        writer.writerow([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>])
        writer.writerows(all_stocks)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraped and saved <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span></span></span><span>(all_stocks)} stocks to morningstar_isin_mapping.csv")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h3 data-start="2863" data-end="2920"><strong data-start="2867" data-end="2920">Step 2: Use the Generated CSV in Your Main Script</strong></h3>
<p data-start="2922" data-end="3081">Once you have the CSV (<code data-start="2945" data-end="2975">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code>), you can use the <strong data-start="2994" data-end="3013">combined script</strong> I shared earlier to look up ISINs and scrape data from Screener.in.</p>
<p data-start="3083" data-end="3134">Here’s your <strong data-start="3095" data-end="3113">unified script</strong> (<code data-start="3115" data-end="3132">isin_scraper.py</code>):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="3136" data-end="6885"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API Key</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load ISIN mapping (this assumes you've already scraped and saved ISIN mappings in a CSV)</span></span><span>
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company_name = isin_mapping.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:

<hr data-start="392" data-end="395">
<h3 data-start="397" data-end="447">Full Code (Using Only FMP API for ISIN Lookup)</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="449" data-end="3649"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your actual FMP API key</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from ISIN using FMP API</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, api_key)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Unable to retrieve company information from FMP API."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
