<h3 data-start="112" data-end="137">Final Unified Script:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="139" data-end="3338"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API Key - already inserted here</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from ISIN using FMP API</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, api_key)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Unable to retrieve company information from FMP API."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):

    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"FMP API error: <span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Return None if there's an error</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If no data, return None</span></span><span>

    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:

                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

    }

<h3 data-start="4592" data-end="4612"><strong data-start="4596" data-end="4612">Key Changes:</strong></h3>
<ol data-start="4614" data-end="5107">
<li data-start="4614" data-end="4783">
<p data-start="4617" data-end="4653"><strong data-start="4617" data-end="4652">Error handling for API response</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="4657" data-end="4783">
<li data-start="4657" data-end="4783">
<p data-start="4659" data-end="4783">If the FMP API returns an error (<code data-start="4692" data-end="4712">status_code != 200</code>), the function now returns <code data-start="4740" data-end="4754">(None, None)</code> to prevent unpacking errors.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="4785" data-end="4964">
<p data-start="4788" data-end="4826"><strong data-start="4788" data-end="4825">Return <code data-start="4797" data-end="4803">None</code> if no data is found</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="4830" data-end="4964">
<li data-start="4830" data-end="4964">
<p data-start="4832" data-end="4964">If no company is found from the FMP API (i.e., the data list is empty), it returns <code data-start="4915" data-end="4929">(None, None)</code> to handle missing data gracefully.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="4966" data-end="5107">
<p data-start="4969" data-end="5008"><strong data-start="4969" data-end="5007">Graceful exit if ISIN lookup fails</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="5012" data-end="5107">
<li data-start="5012" data-end="5107">
<p data-start="5014" data-end="5107">If the <code data-start="5021" data-end="5035">company_name</code> is <code data-start="5039" data-end="5045">None</code>, the program will print an error message and exit gracefully.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>

<p data-start="1365" data-end="1417"><strong data-start="1365" data-end="1382">Save the file</strong> as <code data-start="1386" data-end="1416">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code>.</p>
</li>

<hr data-start="1419" data-end="1422">
<h3 data-start="1424" data-end="1484"><strong data-start="1428" data-end="1484">Step 2: Modify Your Script to Load the ISIN Mappings</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1486" data-end="1586">Now, update your <strong data-start="1503" data-end="1518">main script</strong> (<code data-start="1520" data-end="1537">isin_scraper.py</code>) to <strong data-start="1542" data-end="1585">load the ISIN mapping from the CSV file</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="1588" data-end="1616">Here’s the <strong data-start="1599" data-end="1615">updated code</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1618" data-end="5503"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Return None if there's an error</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If no data, return None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API Key</span></span><span>
    api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load ISIN mapping (this assumes you've already scraped and saved ISIN mappings in a CSV)</span></span><span>
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company_name = isin_mapping.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Use FMP API if ISIN is not found in the local mapping</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ISIN not found in mapping, trying FMP API..."</span></span><span>)
        company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, api_key)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Unable to retrieve company information from FMP API."</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

Once the CSV file is ready, run the <strong data-start="6491" data-end="6509">unified script</strong> (<code data-start="6511" data-end="6528">isin_scraper.py</code>):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="6534" data-end="6574"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>python isin_scraper.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
</li>
<li data-start="6576" data-end="6889">
<p data-start="6579" data-end="6596"><strong data-start="6579" data-end="6593">Enter ISIN</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="6600" data-end="6889">
<li data-start="6600" data-end="6683">
<p data-start="6602" data-end="6683">You’ll be prompted to enter an <strong data-start="6633" data-end="6646">ISIN code</strong> (e.g., <code data-start="6654" data-end="6668">INE002A01018</code> for Reliance).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6687" data-end="6889">
<p data-start="6689" data-end="6705">The script will:</p>
<ol data-start="6711" data-end="6889">
<li data-start="6711" data-end="6774">
<p data-start="6714" data-end="6774">Lookup the <strong data-start="6725" data-end="6741">company name</strong> from the <strong data-start="6751" data-end="6758">CSV</strong> or <strong data-start="6762" data-end="6773">FMP API</strong>.</p>

<h3 data-start="1433" data-end="1482"><strong data-start="1437" data-end="1481">Automated CSV Creation (Python Approach)</strong>:</h3>
<p data-start="1484" data-end="1692">If you want to automate the process of creating the CSV file by scraping data from Morningstar, here's a <strong data-start="1589" data-end="1606">Python script</strong> you can run to extract the data and generate the <code data-start="1656" data-end="1686">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code> file.</p>
<h4 data-start="1694" data-end="1747"><strong data-start="1699" data-end="1746">Python Script to Generate CSV Automatically</strong>:</h4>
<p data-start="1749" data-end="1837">This script assumes the data is available in a <strong data-start="1796" data-end="1830">table on the Morningstar pages</strong> (A-Z):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1839" data-end="3463"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> csv
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> string

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_morningstar_letter</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">letter</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.morningstar.in/equities/<span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>.aspx'
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to load page for letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span> with status </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{response.status_code}</span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> []
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    stocks = []
    table = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'table'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'snapshotTable'</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Update the class if needed</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> table:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"No table found on page <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

    rows = table.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'tr'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> rows[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:]:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># skip header row</span></span><span>
        cols = row.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'td'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(cols) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            company_name = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            isin = cols[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>].get_text(strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
            stocks.append((isin, company_name))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> stocks

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    all_stocks = []
    letters = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(string.ascii_uppercase)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># A-Z</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> letter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> letters:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraping letter <span class="hljs-subst">{letter}</span></span></span><span>...")
        stocks = scrape_morningstar_letter(letter)
        all_stocks.extend(stocks)
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># polite delay</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Save to CSV</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        writer = csv.writer(f)
        writer.writerow([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>])
        writer.writerows(all_stocks)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Scraped and saved <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span></span></span><span>(all_stocks)} stocks to morningstar_isin_mapping.csv")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to load ISIN mapping from a CSV file</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">load_isin_mapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">filename</span></span><span>):
    mapping = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">with</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(filename, newline=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>, encoding=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> row </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> reader:
            mapping[row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ISIN'</span></span><span>].upper()] = row[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Company Name'</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> mapping

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load ISIN mapping (this assumes you've already scraped and saved ISIN mappings in a CSV)</span></span><span>
    isin_mapping = load_isin_mapping(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'morningstar_isin_mapping.csv'</span></span><span>)

    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()
    company_name = isin_mapping.get(isin)

<h3 data-start="6238" data-end="6259"><strong data-start="6242" data-end="6259">How It Works:</strong></h3>
<ol data-start="6261" data-end="6968">
<li data-start="6261" data-end="6487">
<p data-start="6264" data-end="6280"><strong data-start="6264" data-end="6279">ISIN Lookup</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="6284" data-end="6487">
<li data-start="6284" data-end="6372">
<p data-start="6286" data-end="6372">First, the script checks for the <strong data-start="6319" data-end="6338">ISIN in the CSV</strong> (<code data-start="6340" data-end="6370">morningstar_isin_mapping.csv</code>).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6376" data-end="6487">
<p data-start="6378" data-end="6487">If the ISIN is not found in the CSV, it uses the <strong data-start="6427" data-end="6438">FMP API</strong> to retrieve the <strong data-start="6455" data-end="6471">company name</strong> and <strong data-start="6476" data-end="6486">ticker</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>

<p data-start="6492" data-end="6517"><strong data-start="6492" data-end="6516">Screener.in Scraping</strong>:</p>

<p data-start="6523" data-end="6652">After retrieving the company name (either from the CSV or FMP API), it scrapes <strong data-start="6602" data-end="6617">Screener.in</strong> for stock metrics, pros, and cons.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>

<p data-start="6657" data-end="6686"><strong data-start="6657" data-end="6685">Alpha Vantage Stock Data</strong>:</p>

</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="6840" data-end="6968">

<li data-start="6867" data-end="6968">
<p data-start="6869" data-end="6968">The results (metrics, pros, cons, and stock data from Alpha Vantage) are displayed in the terminal.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>

<h3 data-start="252" data-end="373">Let's move forward without the CSV and handle everything via the <strong data-start="321" data-end="332">FMP API</strong> directly for <strong data-start="346" data-end="372">ISIN to company lookup</strong>.</h3>
<h3 data-start="375" data-end="408">Here’s the complete solution:</h3>
<ul data-start="410" data-end="832">
<li data-start="410" data-end="551">
<p data-start="412" data-end="551"><strong data-start="412" data-end="441">ISIN Lookup using FMP API</strong>: If the ISIN isn't found in the CSV, it will use the <strong data-start="495" data-end="506">FMP API</strong> to get the company name and symbol (ticker).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="552" data-end="702">
<p data-start="554" data-end="702"><strong data-start="554" data-end="585">Stock Data from Screener.in</strong>: Once the company name is retrieved (either via FMP or manually), the script scrapes <strong data-start="671" data-end="686">Screener.in</strong> for stock data.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="703" data-end="832">
<p data-start="705" data-end="832"><strong data-start="705" data-end="738">Stock Data from Alpha Vantage</strong>: Using the <strong data-start="750" data-end="768">company symbol</strong> (ticker), the script fetches stock data from <strong data-start="814" data-end="831">Alpha Vantage</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="834" data-end="837">
<h3 data-start="839" data-end="887"><strong data-start="843" data-end="887">Full Code (with FMP API lookup for ISIN)</strong></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="889" data-end="5494"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v4/search/isin?isin=<span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span>&amp;apikey=</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{api_key}</span></span><span>'
    response = requests.get(url)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"FMP API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Return None if there's an error</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> data:
        company_name = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
        ticker = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> company_name, ticker
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If no data, return None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company name</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get stock data from Alpha Vantage API using symbol/ticker</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_stock_data_from_alpha_vantage</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">symbol, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.alphavantage.co/query'</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'function'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'TIME_SERIES_DAILY'</span></span><span>,  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># You can choose other functions, like 'TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY'</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>: symbol,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'apikey'</span></span><span>: api_key
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Alpha Vantage API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Time Series (Daily)"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data:
        daily_data = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Time Series (Daily)"</span></span><span>]
        latest_date = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(daily_data.keys())[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>]  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Latest date</span></span><span>
        latest_data = daily_data[latest_date]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> latest_data
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your actual FMP and Alpha Vantage API keys</span></span><span>
    fmp_api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"VYvgQW7d6mh8fU6pT3fMzsvv1vsCOo4B"</span></span><span>
    alpha_vantage_api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"4OL54CG3BWYLFPK2"</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your actual Alpha Vantage API key</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for user input ISIN</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from ISIN using FMP API</span></span><span>
    company_name, ticker = get_company_from_isin(isin, fmp_api_key)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Unable to retrieve company information from FMP API."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get stock data from Alpha Vantage</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nFetching stock data from Alpha Vantage..."</span></span><span>)
    stock_data = get_stock_data_from_alpha_vantage(ticker, alpha_vantage_api_key)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> stock_data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Latest Stock Data (Date: <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span></span></span><span>(stock_data.keys())[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>]}):")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> key, value </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stock_data.items():
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{key}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{value}</span></span><span>")
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to retrieve stock data from Alpha Vantage."</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="5496" data-end="5499">
<h3 data-start="5501" data-end="5531"><strong data-start="5505" data-end="5530">How This Script Works</strong>:</h3>
<ol data-start="5533" data-end="6054">
<li data-start="5533" data-end="5678">
<p data-start="5536" data-end="5565"><strong data-start="5536" data-end="5564">ISIN Lookup with FMP API</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="5569" data-end="5678">
<li data-start="5569" data-end="5678">
<p data-start="5571" data-end="5678">You input an ISIN, and the script checks the <strong data-start="5616" data-end="5627">FMP API</strong> to get the <strong data-start="5639" data-end="5655">company name</strong> and <strong data-start="5660" data-end="5677">ticker symbol</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5680" data-end="5884">
<p data-start="5683" data-end="5722"><strong data-start="5683" data-end="5721">Scrape Stock Data from Screener.in</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="5726" data-end="5884">
<li data-start="5726" data-end="5884">
<p data-start="5728" data-end="5884">After retrieving the company name (either from FMP or manually), the script scrapes <strong data-start="5812" data-end="5827">Screener.in</strong> for key metrics, pros, and cons related to that company.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5886" data-end="6054">
<p data-start="5889" data-end="5929"><strong data-start="5889" data-end="5928">Fetch Stock Data from Alpha Vantage</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="5933" data-end="6054">
<li data-start="5933" data-end="6054">
<p data-start="5935" data-end="6054">After the company’s <strong data-start="5955" data-end="5972">ticker symbol</strong> is found, it fetches <strong data-start="5994" data-end="6014">daily stock data</strong> from <strong data-start="6020" data-end="6037">Alpha Vantage</strong> and displays it.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>

<h3 data-start="6061" data-end="6091"><strong data-start="6065" data-end="6090">How to Run the Script</strong>:</h3>
<ol data-start="6093" data-end="6684">
<li data-start="6093" data-end="6257">
<p data-start="6096" data-end="6200"><strong data-start="6096" data-end="6126">Install Required Libraries</strong>:<br>
Make sure you have <strong data-start="6150" data-end="6164"><code data-start="6152" data-end="6162">requests</code></strong> and <strong data-start="6169" data-end="6189"><code data-start="6171" data-end="6187">beautifulsoup4</code></strong> installed:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="6204" data-end="6257"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>pip install requests beautifulsoup4
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
</li>
<li data-start="6259" data-end="6395">

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Alpha Vantage API function to get stock data using company symbol</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>

            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            child_divs = flex_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, recursive=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>:
                pros = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(child_divs) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
                cons = [child_divs[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>].get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No pros/cons div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get stock data from Alpha Vantage API using symbol/ticker</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_stock_data_from_alpha_vantage</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">symbol, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.alphavantage.co/query'</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'function'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'TIME_SERIES_DAILY'</span></span><span>,  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># You can choose other functions, like 'TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY'</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>: symbol,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'apikey'</span></span><span>: api_key
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Alpha Vantage API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Time Series (Daily)"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data:
        daily_data = data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Time Series (Daily)"</span></span><span>]
        latest_date = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(daily_data.keys())[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>]  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Latest date</span></span><span>
        latest_data = daily_data[latest_date]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> latest_data
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Alpha Vantage API Key</span></span><span>
    alpha_vantage_api_key = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"4OL54CG3BWYLFPK2"</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Replace with your actual Alpha Vantage API key</span></span><span>

    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:

<h3 data-start="4949" data-end="4972"><strong data-start="4953" data-end="4971">How This Works</strong>:</h3>

    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{company_name.replace(<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).upper()}/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)
