    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(response.text[:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">500</span></span><span>])  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># This will print a snippet of the page HTML</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No flex div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get stock data from Alpha Vantage API using symbol/ticker</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_stock_data_from_alpha_vantage</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">symbol, api_key</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f'https://www.alphavantage.co/query'</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'function'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'TIME_SERIES_DAILY'</span></span><span>,  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># You can choose other functions, like 'TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY'</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'symbol'</span></span><span>: symbol,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'apikey'</span></span><span>: api_key
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Alpha Vantage API error:"</span></span><span>, response.status_code)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = response.json()

        latest_date = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(daily_data.keys())[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>]  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Latest date</span></span><span>
        latest_data = daily_data[latest_date]
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> latest_data
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Attempting to fetch from FMP API..."</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():

<h3 data-start="6433" data-end="6460"><strong data-start="6437" data-end="6459">How the Code Works</strong>:</h3>
<ol data-start="6461" data-end="6899">
<li data-start="6461" data-end="6606">

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># FMP API function to get company name from ISIN</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_company_from_isin</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">isin, api_key</span></span><span>):

    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_stock_data_from_alpha_vantage</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">symbol, api_key</span></span><span>):

<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="714" data-end="3819"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># List of company names and their corresponding NSE ticker symbols</span></span><span>
company_mapping = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Reliance Industries'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'RELIANCE'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Tata Consultancy Services'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'TCS'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Infosys'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INFY'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HDFC Bank'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HDFCBANK'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Larsen &amp; Toubro'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'LT'</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company ticker symbol</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name, ticker</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Fetching data from: <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Debugging line to print the URL</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No flex div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Main function</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Loop through the companies and scrape data</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> company_name, ticker </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> company_mapping.items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFetching data for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>...")
        
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
        data = scrape_stock_data(company_name, ticker)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to scrape stock data for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>.")
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nResults for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>:")

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<p data-start="221" data-end="248">Let’s modify the script to:</p>

<h3 data-start="440" data-end="477"><strong data-start="444" data-end="460">Updated Code</strong> with ISIN Input:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="479" data-end="3990"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Hardcoded ISIN-to-Company Mapping</span></span><span>
isin_to_company = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE002A01018'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Reliance Industries'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE123A01016'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Tata Consultancy Services'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE062A01020'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Infosys'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE105A01010'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HDFC Bank'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE258A01026'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Larsen &amp; Toubro'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE446A01022'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Bajaj Finance'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE040A01034'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ICICI Bank'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE467A01023'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Hindustan Unilever'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE318A01028'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Maruti Suzuki'</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE274A01024'</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'State Bank of India'</span></span><span>
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company ticker symbol</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name, ticker</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Fetching data from: <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Debugging line to print the URL</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No flex div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Main function to ask for ISIN and fetch data</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for ISIN code</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from hardcoded ISIN mapping</span></span><span>
    company_name = isin_to_company.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_name:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Company for ISIN <span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span> not found.")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Format company name for NSE ticker symbol in Screener.in</span></span><span>
    ticker = company_name.replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">''</span></span><span>).lower()  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Remove spaces and convert to lowercase</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name, ticker)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE040A01034'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ICICI Bank'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ICICIBANK'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE467A01023'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Hindustan Unilever'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HINDUNILVR'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE318A01028'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Maruti Suzuki'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'MARUTI'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE274A01024'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'State Bank of India'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'SBIN'</span></span><span>)
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company ticker symbol</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name, ticker</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Fetching data from: <span class="hljs-subst">{url}</span></span></span><span>")  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Debugging line to print the URL</span></span><span>
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve data from Screener.in for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No flex div found"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No analysis section found"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Main function to ask for ISIN and fetch data</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">main</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Ask for ISIN code</span></span><span>
    isin = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN code: "</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company and ticker from hardcoded ISIN mapping</span></span><span>
    company_data = isin_to_company.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Company for ISIN <span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span> not found.")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    company_name, ticker = company_data

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"\nFound company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>")
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name, ticker)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Failed to scrape stock data."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display results</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nKey Metrics:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>")

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    main()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="4653" data-end="4684"><strong data-start="4657" data-end="4683">Explanation of Updates</strong>:</h3>
<ol data-start="4686" data-end="5434">
<li data-start="4686" data-end="4928">
<p data-start="4689" data-end="4727"><strong data-start="4689" data-end="4726">Hardcoded ISIN-to-Company Mapping</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="4731" data-end="4928">
<li data-start="4731" data-end="4928">
<p data-start="4733" data-end="4825">I’ve updated the mapping to include <strong data-start="4769" data-end="4778">ISINs</strong>, <strong data-start="4780" data-end="4797">company names</strong>, and their <strong data-start="4809" data-end="4824">NSE tickers</strong>.</p>

<li data-start="4831" data-end="4928">

</ul>

</ul>
</li>

<p data-start="4957" data-end="5031">The script now fetches data from <strong data-start="4990" data-end="5005">Screener.in</strong> using the <strong data-start="5016" data-end="5030">NSE ticker</strong>.</p>

<li data-start="5150" data-end="5242">
<p data-start="5152" data-end="5242">For <strong data-start="5156" data-end="5179">Reliance Industries</strong>, the URL will be: <code data-start="5198" data-end="5241">https://www.screener.in/company/RELIANCE/</code>.</p>

<ul data-start="5268" data-end="5434">
<li data-start="5268" data-end="5302">
<p data-start="5270" data-end="5302">The user will input an <strong data-start="5293" data-end="5301">ISIN</strong>.</p>

<li data-start="5306" data-end="5434">

<hr data-start="549" data-end="552">
<h3 data-start="554" data-end="597"><strong data-start="558" data-end="596">Step-by-Step Code to Build the GUI</strong>:</h3>
<p data-start="599" data-end="732">Here’s a simple example to create a GUI that takes an <strong data-start="653" data-end="666">ISIN code</strong>, calls the existing scraping functions, and displays the results:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="734" data-end="4826"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> tkinter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> tk
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> tkinter </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> messagebox
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> bs4 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> BeautifulSoup

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Hardcoded ISIN-to-Company Mapping with their corresponding NSE tickers</span></span><span>
isin_to_company = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE002A01018'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Reliance Industries'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'RELIANCE'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE123A01016'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Tata Consultancy Services'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'TCS'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE062A01020'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Infosys'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INFY'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE105A01010'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HDFC Bank'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HDFCBANK'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE258A01026'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Larsen &amp; Toubro'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'LT'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE446A01022'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Bajaj Finance'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'BAJFINANCE'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE040A01034'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ICICI Bank'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ICICIBANK'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE467A01023'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Hindustan Unilever'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HINDUNILVR'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE318A01028'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Maruti Suzuki'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'MARUTI'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE274A01024'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'State Bank of India'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'SBIN'</span></span><span>)
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company ticker symbol</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name, ticker</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GUI Function</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">on_submit</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get the ISIN entered by the user</span></span><span>
    isin = isin_entry.get().strip().upper()

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from hardcoded ISIN mapping</span></span><span>
    company_data = isin_to_company.get(isin)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> company_data:
        messagebox.showerror(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Error"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Company for ISIN <span class="hljs-subst">{isin}</span></span></span><span> not found.")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    company_name, ticker = company_data

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
    data = scrape_stock_data(company_name, ticker)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> data:
        messagebox.showerror(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Error"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Failed to retrieve stock data for <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>.")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Display the data in the text boxes</span></span><span>
    result_text.delete(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1.0</span></span><span>, tk.END)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Clear previous results</span></span><span>
    result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Found company: <span class="hljs-subst">{company_name}</span></span></span><span>\n\n")
    
    result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Key Metrics:\n"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> k, v </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'metrics'</span></span><span>].items():
        result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{k}</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{v}</span></span><span>\n")

    result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nPros:\n"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> p </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'pros'</span></span><span>]:
        result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{p}</span></span></span><span>\n")

    result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\nCons:\n"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'cons'</span></span><span>]:
        result_text.insert(tk.END, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"- <span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span></span><span>\n")

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Create the main application window</span></span><span>
root = tk.Tk()
root.title(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Stock Data Fetcher"</span></span><span>)
root.geometry(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"600x500"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ISIN Input</span></span><span>
isin_label = tk.Label(root, text=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Enter ISIN Code:"</span></span><span>)
isin_label.pack(pady=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>)

isin_entry = tk.Entry(root, width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>)
isin_entry.pack(pady=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Submit Button</span></span><span>
submit_button = tk.Button(root, text=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Submit"</span></span><span>, command=on_submit)
submit_button.pack(pady=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Result Text Box</span></span><span>
result_text = tk.Text(root, width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">70</span></span><span>, height=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>)
result_text.pack(pady=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Run the GUI</span></span><span>
root.mainloop()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h3 data-start="4833" data-end="4859"><strong data-start="4837" data-end="4858">How the GUI Works</strong>:</h3>

<li data-start="4860" data-end="4926">
<p data-start="4863" data-end="4926"><strong data-start="4863" data-end="4872">Input</strong>: The user enters the <strong data-start="4894" data-end="4907">ISIN code</strong> in the text field.</p>

<p data-start="4930" data-end="5089"><strong data-start="4930" data-end="4944">Fetch Data</strong>: When the user clicks <strong data-start="4967" data-end="4977">Submit</strong>, the application fetches the company name from the <strong data-start="5029" data-end="5050">hardcoded mapping</strong> and scrapes data from <strong data-start="5073" data-end="5088">Screener.in</strong>.</p>

<p data-start="5093" data-end="5212"><strong data-start="5093" data-end="5112">Display Results</strong>: The results (company name, key metrics, pros, cons) are displayed in the text box below the input.</p>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE467A01023'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Hindustan Unilever'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'HINDUNILVR'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE318A01028'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Maruti Suzuki'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'MARUTI'</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'INE274A01024'</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'State Bank of India'</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'SBIN'</span></span><span>)
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in using company ticker symbol</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">scrape_stock_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">company_name, ticker</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"https://www.screener.in/company/<span class="hljs-subst">{ticker}</span></span></span><span>/"
    headers = {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"User-Agent"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Mozilla/5.0"</span></span><span>}
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> response.status_code != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>

    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"html.parser"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape key metrics</span></span><span>
    metrics = {}
    ratios = soup.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'div'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company-ratios'</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> ratio_div </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ratios:
        items = ratio_div.find_all(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'li'</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> item </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> items:
            key_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'name'</span></span><span>)
            value_span = item.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'span'</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'number'</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> key_span </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> value_span:
                key = key_span.text.strip()
                value = value_span.text.strip()
                metrics[key] = value

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape Pros and Cons</span></span><span>
    pros = []
    cons = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract the pros and cons sections</span></span><span>
    analysis_section = soup.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"section"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"analysis"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> analysis_section:
        flex_div = analysis_section.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"flex flex-column-mobile flex-gap-32"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> flex_div:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting pros</span></span><span>
            pros_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> pros_div:
                pros_content = pros_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                pros = pros_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extracting cons</span></span><span>
            cons_div = flex_div.find(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"div"</span></span><span>, class_=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> cons_div:
                cons_content = cons_div.get_text(separator=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>, strip=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
                cons = cons_content.split(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"metrics"</span></span><span>: metrics,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pros"</span></span><span>: pros,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"cons"</span></span><span>: cons
    }

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># View to handle ISIN input and fetch stock data</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">isin_view</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">request</span></span><span>):
    company_data = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    data = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Get ISIN from form input</span></span><span>
        isin = request.POST.get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'isin_code'</span></span><span>).strip().upper()

        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Lookup company from hardcoded ISIN mapping</span></span><span>
        company_data = isin_to_company.get(isin)

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> company_data:
            company_name, ticker = company_data

            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Scrape stock data from Screener.in</span></span><span>
            data = scrape_stock_data(company_name, ticker)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> render(request, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'stock/isin_input.html'</span></span><span>, {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'company_data'</span></span><span>: company_data, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'data'</span></span><span>: data})
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="4979" data-end="5011"><strong data-start="4983" data-end="5010">Explanation of the View</strong>:</h3>
<ul data-start="5013" data-end="5327">
<li data-start="5013" data-end="5327">
<p data-start="5015" data-end="5106"><strong data-start="5015" data-end="5030"><code data-start="5017" data-end="5028">isin_view</code></strong>: This view will handle the ISIN input. When the form is submitted, it will:</p>
<ul data-start="5109" data-end="5327">
<li data-start="5109" data-end="5182">
<p data-start="5111" data-end="5182">Look up the <strong data-start="5123" data-end="5139">company name</strong> and <strong data-start="5144" data-end="5154">ticker</strong> from the hardcoded mapping.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5185" data-end="5259">
<p data-start="5187" data-end="5259">Scrape data from <strong data-start="5204" data-end="5219">Screener.in</strong> for the given company using the ticker.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5262" data-end="5327">
<p data-start="5264" data-end="5327">Pass the <strong data-start="5273" data-end="5289">company data</strong> and <strong data-start="5294" data-end="5310">scraped data</strong> to the template.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="5329" data-end="5332">
<h4 data-start="5334" data-end="5370"><strong data-start="5339" data-end="5370">Step 4: Create the Template</strong></h4>
<p data-start="5372" data-end="5459">Create an HTML template where the user can input the <strong data-start="5425" data-end="5438">ISIN code</strong> and see the results.</p>
<ul data-start="5461" data-end="5511">
<li data-start="5461" data-end="5511">
<p data-start="5463" data-end="5511">Create a <code data-start="5472" data-end="5505">templates/stock/isin_input.html</code> file.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="5513" data-end="6607"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none rounded-t-[5px]">html</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none px-4 py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-html"><span><span><span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- templates/stock/isin_input.html --&gt;</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">&lt;!DOCTYPE <span class="hljs-keyword">html</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">html</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">lang</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"en"</span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">head</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">meta</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">charset</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"UTF-8"</span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">meta</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">name</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"viewport"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">content</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"</span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">title</span></span></span><span>&gt;ISIN Stock Scraper</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">title</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">head</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">body</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span></span></span><span>&gt;Enter ISIN Code</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">form</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">method</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"post"</span></span><span>&gt;
        {% csrf_token %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">label</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">for</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"isin_code"</span></span><span>&gt;ISIN Code:</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">label</span></span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">type</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"text"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"isin_code"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">name</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"isin_code"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">required</span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">type</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"submit"</span></span><span>&gt;Submit</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">form</span></span></span><span>&gt;

    {% if company_data %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;Company: {{ company_data.0 }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;Key Metrics:</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% for key, value in data.metrics.items %}
                </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;{{ key }}: {{ value }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% endfor %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;

        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;Pros:</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% for pro in data.pros %}
                </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;{{ pro }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% endfor %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;

        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;Cons:</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h3</span></span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% for con in data.cons %}
                </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;{{ con }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span></span></span><span>&gt;
            {% endfor %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    {% endif %}
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">body</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">html</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="6609" data-end="6645"><strong data-start="6613" data-end="6644">Explanation of the Template</strong>:</h3>
<ul data-start="6647" data-end="6910">
<li data-start="6647" data-end="6758">
<p data-start="6649" data-end="6758"><strong data-start="6649" data-end="6657">Form</strong>: The user will input an ISIN code, and when the form is submitted, it triggers the scraping process.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6759" data-end="6910">
<p data-start="6761" data-end="6812"><strong data-start="6761" data-end="6780">Display Results</strong>: If data is found, it displays:</p>
<ul data-start="6815" data-end="6910">
<li data-start="6815" data-end="6834">
<p data-start="6817" data-end="6834"><strong data-start="6817" data-end="6833">Company Name</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6837" data-end="6910">
<p data-start="6839" data-end="6910"><strong data-start="6839" data-end="6854">Key Metrics</strong>, <strong data-start="6856" data-end="6864">Pros</strong>, and <strong data-start="6870" data-end="6878">Cons</strong> (scraped from <strong data-start="6893" data-end="6908">Screener.in</strong>).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
